= Upcoming Features =

The following features are planned:

 * Current latitude/longitude can be detected and set by the user as input parameters
 * Translations into multiple languages.  If you wish to help in the translation efforts, please send us translations of the following two files into your languages of choice:
  * [http://adhanalarm.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/AdhanAlarm/res/values/arrays.xml arrays.xml]
  * [http://adhanalarm.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/AdhanAlarm/res/values/strings.xml strings.xml]
